correct_order: The invention of electronics has become a challenge.
An Indian university persuaded IT service department to have an Electronic Recycling Collection Day.
During these days, people are encouraged to recycle their e-waste instead of throwing them into the bin.
On certain days throughout the year, many electronic devices like …. From families and households … have been recycled…. 200,000 electronic products had been recycled in 2010.

sources: The invention of electronics has become a challenge.
An Indian university persuaded IT service department to have an Electronic Recycling Collection Day.
During these days, people are encouraged to recycle their e-waste instead of throwing them into the bin.
On certain days throughout the year, many electronic devices like …. From families and households … have been recycled…. 200,000 electronic products had been recycled in 2010.
